title: Feedback-Driven Language Learning Framework: Short-Intensive Course for Scientific Vocational Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level understanding of scientific field-specific terminology and ability to utilize basic digital tools
context.additional_context: Science field job environment simulation reflecting Saudi Arabian cultural contexts

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% accuracy in incorporating feedback during oral presentations using specialized scientific terminology.
Learners complete a draft report reflecting peer feedback at least three times using digital collaboration tools.
Learners apply science communication strategies considering cultural contexts to project deliverables.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
